previewArticle.title: Chivas USA vs. LA Galaxy | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Chivas USA 0, LA Galaxy 3 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Chivas USA vs. Los Angeles Galaxy

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Ah, AJB is playing out on the left, Boca is in the middle with Zavaleta. That makes more sense.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Carlos Alvarez (Chivas USA).
Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Diagonal balls are finding tons of space behind the Chivas defense. Expect that trend to continue. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: WIDE! Marcelo Sarvas with the best chance of the afternoon as Keane plays him through. Needed to finish that one.

timelineItems.name: Jeff
timelineItems.text: How is the @StubHubCenter not sold out for #CHVvLA ? I know its a #Chivas home game, but why don't the #Galaxy fans pack the rest? #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Donovan pulls the shot wide

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Omar González.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Juuuuuust a bit outside. Landon Donovan gets played over the top and his shot sails just past the far post. That looked like 135.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: .@LandonDonovan has a shot that goes just wide in the 13’. That had “record breaker” all over it. Tons of space for #LAGalaxy strikers

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Omar González (LA Galaxy).
Luke Moore (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Leonardo.

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: Donovan played over the top by Gonzalez. Great ball, but it's way too easy from a Chivas USA perspective. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Eriq Zavaleta.

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 15' #LAGalaxy with the counter attack after a #ChivasUSA corner kick... @1DanKennedy saves

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Marcelo Sarvas mishits a pass to a streaking @LandonDonovan. Robbie Keane started the break. Another opportunity wasted. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Erick Torres.

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 18 - @LAGalaxy have lost just 1 of their last 18 meetings (inc playoffs) with @cdchivasusa in @MLS play (12W 6D). Lopsided. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Baggio Husidic.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA had a great counter but #LAGalaxy defender Dan Gargen read it well to pick it off. #mls #superclasico

timelineItems.name: Mike McGuire
timelineItems.text: Chivas keep playing fast & loose like this they're gonna get crushed #LAGalaxy getting all sorts of space in the attacking 3rd #MLS

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Stefan Ishizaki taking the corner kicks today. Chivas doesn’t have a ton of height, so getting LD into the mix makes some sense. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Jacob B.
timelineItems.text: Some goofy looking lineups thrown out for both sides in #CHVvLA. Will be interesting to see how they play out.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: No Gyasi Zardes on the 18 for #LAGalaxy. He was listed as questionable with a right knee issue. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Kids are lining up for the handshake line. Shouldn’t be too long before the players make their way onto the field. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 2 - @LAGalaxy's @gyasinho has only scored against Chivas USA and Vancouver in MLS play, scoring 2 against both teams. Favorite. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is too high.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Cubo Torres fails to finish from a tight angle

timelineItems.name: D a n y e l l e
timelineItems.text: LD10 #CHVvLA #LAGalaxy http://t.co/yjP7vw6cMq

timelineItems.name: D a n y e l l e
timelineItems.text: LD10 #CHVvLA #LAGalaxy http://t.co/yjP7vw6cMq

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy WUFC
timelineItems.text: The boys are ready #lagalaxy http://t.co/4Ygy5l06HF

timelineItems.name: Nick Green
timelineItems.text: #superclasico from #Carson #LaGalaxy #Chivasusa http://t.co/p7tH1l5ue4

timelineItems.name: Nick Green
timelineItems.text: #superclasico from #Carson #LaGalaxy #Chivasusa http://t.co/p7tH1l5ue4

timelineItems.name: Young Hoon Kim
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy wearing their black away jerseys. IMO they should wear those at home games too

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Donovan douses the trainers before every game. He takes the water bottle and soaks his own head before spraying the trainers. #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: And we're off. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is too high. Assisted by Mauro Rosales.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: Marcelo Sarvas' chip shot... close, but no cigar. http://t.co/E2HEhqnX57 #CHVvLA #SuperClasico

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Gargan got beat by “The Mullet” and was lucky to not be punished for it. McNamara showing some good moves in the box. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: WeFollowFutbol
timelineItems.text: 19' 0-0 between @cdchivasusa and the winless @LAGalaxy. Though winless is a bit unfair...just the Galaxy's third match. #mls #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The #LAGalaxy immediately come out on the attack. Landon Donovan and Robbie Keane getting looks.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Kickoff between @CDChivasUSA + @LAGalaxy and 2014 #SuperClasico is underway. Follow along here: http://t.co/ofC1GCDowD #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Chivas USA 0, LA Galaxy 3.

timelineItems.name: Jonny
timelineItems.text: And that's another L.A. "clasico". #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: eric robles
timelineItems.text: Great win for the #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The @LAGalaxy have 4 points after 3 games. That’s better. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Leftie Quixote
timelineItems.text: No goal for Landon today but a great team performance to beat Chivas USA for our first win of the season! #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: FT - 3-0. The #SuperClasico ends in familiar fashion as the @LAGalaxy put forth a dominating performance in victory over Chivas. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 4 - @LAGalaxy have now allowed just 4 goals in their last 14 regular season @MLS games against Chivas USA. Continued. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.desc: Chivas USA and the Los Angeles Galaxy face off at the StubHub Center to contest the first SuperClasico of 2014.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Chivas USA vs. Los Angeles Galaxy | April 6, 2014

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA).
Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: It’s scoreless through 20 minutes here at @Stubhubcenter. The #LAGalaxy look the more dangerous side. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Offside, LA Galaxy. Landon Donovan tries a through ball, but Robbie Keane is caught offside.
Foul by Carlos Alvarez (Chivas USA).
Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Is that who I think it is? #Cool RT @LAGalaxy Legends all over the place. #CHVvLA http://t.co/SpUx1VN02O

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Is that who I think it is? #Cool RT @LAGalaxy Legends all over the place. #CHVvLA http://t.co/SpUx1VN02O

timelineItems.name: Kristian Russell
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy need to make the most of their set pieces. Could come back to bite them.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Todd Dunivant.
Carlos Alvarez (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy).
Attempt missed. Eriq Zavaleta (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left following a corner.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Todd Dunivant.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left from a direct free kick.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: The FK from Rosales goes wide
YELLOW: Dan Gargan with a high foot

timelineItems.name: El Padrino
timelineItems.text: #LAG and #ChivasUSA should do what they do in Chile for their Clasico and just let each teams's supporters have each end of the stadium.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left from a direct free kick.
Carlos Bocanegra (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy).
Attempt blocked. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Stefan Ishizaki.

timelineItems.name: Javier Moreno
timelineItems.text: David Beckham is In The Building, Man @ACBrigade Sounds Amazing On TV Imagine Live :)) Can You Hear The Chivas Sing No!! No!!! #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Good crowd for #CHVvLA. The @ACBrigade in full voice. #LAX http://t.co/ggd0gAfJAc

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Good crowd for #CHVvLA. The @ACBrigade in full voice. #LAX http://t.co/ggd0gAfJAc

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Juninho launched a shot from just short of 40 yards out. Deflects out for a corner kick. #LAGALAXY

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Great tackle by Avila who has settled well into the right back role. #chivasusa

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Agustín Pelletieri.
Foul by Omar González (LA Galaxy).
Carlos Bocanegra (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Kristian Russell
timelineItems.text: Nice start so far for the boys. Keane and Donovan pairing up early. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: This Diamond formation allows all of the midfielders to be pressing the high line on offense. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Wow. Donovan’s heels clipped. This referee clearly doesn’t know who just got tackled. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: WeFollowFutbol
timelineItems.text: Is today the day when @landondonovan bags goal No. 135 to take the all-time lead? 0-0 for @cdchivasusa and @LAGalaxy in the 31st. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 31' Donovan gets pulled down by Rosales to end a string of dangerous possession by the #LAGalaxy, but no foul whistle by Drew Fischer.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Keano battling the goats. #CHVvLA http://t.co/udXit2dLDp

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Keano battling the goats. #CHVvLA http://t.co/udXit2dLDp

timelineItems.name: Andrew Quasared S.
timelineItems.text: Ishizaki back on the wing now? Is that an actual change or can he just not resist the sideline? #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: The @CDChviasUSA fans near the press box are chanting "Bofo, Bofo, Bofo." Hmm.

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA) because of an injury.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, LA Galaxy 1. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from very close range to the center of the goal. Assisted by Dan Gargan with a header.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Robbie Keane manages to deflect it across the line

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, LA Galaxy 1. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from very close range to the center of the goal. Assisted by Dan Gargan with a header.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Robbie Keane manages to deflect it across the line

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 35' WIDE! Landon Donovan finds Keane, but he can't direct the chance on goal. Just so close from LA who are still in control of the match

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Keane and Donovan, even with both players playing a little deeper, such a lethal combo. #chivasusa

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: WeFollowFutbol
timelineItems.text: 37' GOAL @LAGalaxy! (1-0). It's Robbie Keane. #CHVvLA #mls

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 36' Goal for #LAGalaxy by Keane | Gol para #LAGalaxy de Keane. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: GOOOOOAAAAAAAALLLLL ROBBIE KEANE! #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 37' @LAGALAXY GOAL! Gargan finds Keane who directs the ball toward goal with his body. Sloppy but effective. #LAGalaxy up 1-0.

timelineItems.comment: Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Leonardo (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.desc: Erick Torres (Chivas USA) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW: Cubo Torres loses his cool

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Chaos inside the six-yard box and Robbie Keane is there to clean up the mess. @LAGalaxy take a 1-0 lead in the #SuperClasico. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Erick Torres (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 39' On the goal, Ishizaki finds Gargan who directs it toward Keane, but Kennedy gets a touch and puts it toward Keane who hits it in.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Torres gets a nice Thank You from Dan Gargan. That was an ugly, ugly tackle. Yellow Card. Bad Cubo. Bad! #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 40' Yellow card issued to | Tarjeta amarilla para: Torres #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Keane was a little slow on the celebration so maybe Kennedy's complaint has merit. #chivasusa #lagalaxy #superclasico

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Erick “Cubo” Torres goes into the referee’s book for tackling Ishizaki from behind which is not allowed in soccer. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane was dancing the line… And the line just stepped on his foot. Offside. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Legends all over the place. #CHVvLA http://t.co/Lnwgmd58A1

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Legends all over the place. #CHVvLA http://t.co/Lnwgmd58A1

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, LA Galaxy 2. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Stefan Ishizaki with a clinical chipped finish

timelineItems.name: brendan hannan
timelineItems.text: For those keeping score at home that's 36 goals in 59 @MLS appearances for #Keano #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy fans chanting "This is our house" and Stefan Ishizaki promptly rewards them with a goal to make it 2-0

timelineItems.name: TWC SportsNet
timelineItems.text: GOAL: Stefan Ishizaki scores his first goal for @LAGalaxy, who now lead 2-0 vs @cdchivasusa. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: WeFollowFutbol
timelineItems.text: 41' GOAL @LAGalaxy! (2-0). Ishizaki from a very tough angle to double the Galaxy lead. #CHVvLA #mls

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Ishizaki with the most delightful dink you’ll ever see over Kennedy to double the G’s lead. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Nick Green
timelineItems.text: Too easy for #LAGalaxy in #Superclasico as #Chivasusa make opponents look good with more passive defending. 2-0 43"

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Stefan Ishizaki lands his first goal in MLS and doubles the lead for @LAGalaxy. http://t.co/4koKvUiN4A #CHVvLA #SuperClasico

timelineItems.comment: Eric Avila (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane celebrates opening the scoring for the #LAGalaxy. #CHVvLA http://t.co/EXuB1uSJKM

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: "This is no rivalry" is the chant from @ACBrigade. #SuperClasico

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: One minute stoppage time added to the first half | Un minuto ha sido agregado a la primera mitad #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane celebrates opening the scoring for the #LAGalaxy. #CHVvLA http://t.co/EXuB1uSJKM

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy).
Eric Avila (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Kristian Russell
timelineItems.text: I love Keane, I really do, but he needs to stop trying to dribble through people. It hasn't work the last 500 times he's tried it. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy 2, #ChivasUSA 0, halftime. Galaxy could have had more

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 45' 2-0. - The @LAGalaxy are in the drivers seat as Chivas USA head into the locker room with heads down. Goals from Keane and Ishizaki.

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Chivas USA 0, LA Galaxy 2.

timelineItems.name: Alison Rose
timelineItems.text: Okay, LD. In the second half, it's your turn to score and break that record �⚽️ #LAGalaxy #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Susy MartinDelCampo
timelineItems.text: #MLS Al descanso en el StubHub Center, #ChivasUSA 0 - 2 #LAGalaxy goles e Keane y Stefan Ishizaki.

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: 1st half plan didn't work, and they're down 2. Yikes...guess my skepticism was justified, unfortunately.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: WATCH: Robbie Keane cleans up the mess: http://t.co/Ih2c4YRiEy #CHVvLA http://t.co/7SUKkuDOGt

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: WATCH: Robbie Keane cleans up the mess: http://t.co/Ih2c4YRiEy #CHVvLA http://t.co/7SUKkuDOGt

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Omar Gonzalez and Juninho are 1/3 of #LAGalaxy passes. 8 #chivasusa players have 7-10% Carlos Alvarez has 15%. More sharing, less scoring.

timelineItems.name: Joey McCune
timelineItems.text: You shouldn't be allowed to call it the #superclasico if you tarp off 1/4 of a shared stadium and still can't pack it. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Javier Renovato
timelineItems.text: Le verdad, este partido no tiene nada de #clásico entre #ChivasUSA y #Galaxy. Esperemos que mejoré para la 2do tiempo http://t.co/Gr4Rk7dktz

timelineItems.name: Javier Renovato
timelineItems.text: Le verdad, este partido no tiene nada de #clásico entre #ChivasUSA y #Galaxy. Esperemos que mejoré para la 2do tiempo http://t.co/Gr4Rk7dktz

timelineItems.text: Chaos inside the six-yard box and Robbie Keane is there to clean up the mess. @LAGalaxy take a 1-0 lead in the #SuperClasico. #CHVvLA"

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Samuel getting a run out from Galaxy S&C coach Ben Yauss at halftime. Could he be coming in at some point in the second half? #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Leftie Quixote
timelineItems.text: Meanwhile, former #LAGalaxy midfielder Michael Stephens & former Chivas USA head coach Bob Bradley have won 2-1 with Norwegian club Stabæk.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Watching Ishizaki’s goal on replay I thought for sure that play was over when he took that horrible 1st touch. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: #USMNT boss Jurgen Klinsmann is in attendance for #CHVvLA.

timelineItems.text: Great to see @HeyDanGargan starting for #LAGalaxy and providing a nice assist on team's first goal today. #CHVvLA #MLS

timelineItems.text: My favorite Irish Footballer: #RobbieKeane "Robbie Keane celebrates opening the scoring for #LAGalaxy http://t.co/82Y8qoFrE8” #CHVvLA #IRE

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Chivas USA 0, LA Galaxy 2.

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Moore pulled. He tracked back alright, but appeared to want the ball served to him on a platter in the box, which didn't happen.

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: We're back for the second half of the match! | Estamos de regreso a la segunda mitad! #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Hopefully it's just him settling in a new league, because Moore hasn't looked at all impressive so far.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: The @LAGalaxy now have 11 goals in their third unis.

timelineItems.text: I need to see better passing from Marcelo Sarvas in this second half. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.text: .@AJD_20 still nursing the injury that was so graciously handed to him by RSL’s Saborio. Not in the 18 today. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 50' OFF THE LINE! Bocanegra with the timely stop as Keane's chip over Kennedy was destined for the goal.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Off the line! Keane almost scores his second but Bocanegra is there to clear it out. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Ok, Boca did well on that play.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Timely heroics by @ajeanbaptiste92. I love goal line clearances! #chivasusa

timelineItems.name: Nick Green
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy had 67 more passes than #Chivasusa in first half allowing LA to pile up 88 percent of possession. More pressure needed by Goats.

timelineItems.name: Ken Oplinger
timelineItems.text: The @UniMas announcers just thanked those watching the #CHVvLA match who don't speak Spanish for watching. They thanked them in Spanish...

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Keane slips a shot past Kennedy but Baptiste clears it off the line. Still #LAGalaxy 2, #ChivasUSA 0

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Dan Gargan with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 53' Ishizaki JUST missed another chance. Just moments after he was cleaned out by Rosales.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top right corner.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Stefan Ishizaki not on Drew Fischer’s Christmas card list. Ishi was killed by a studs up challenge. Then almost recovers to score. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Andrew Quasared S.
timelineItems.text: UniMás announcers after @StefanIshizaki was taken down: “Este es futbol! No futbol americano!” #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Michael K. Dovellos
timelineItems.text: Boca came up BIG there on that goal line clearance vs. Keane there! #ChivasUSA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Lost in all that was a shot from @landondonovan that never quite got away. He’s got to score today, right? #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, LA Galaxy 3. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Baggio Husidic with a low drive

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, LA Galaxy 3. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Baggio Husidic with a low drive

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 56' @Ba66io HUSIDIC! Keane to LD to Husidic who just SMASHES it in. What a finish. The rout is officially on. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Kristian Russell
timelineItems.text: Looks like everybody BUT Donovan is going to score today. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: WeFollowFutbol
timelineItems.text: 56' GOAL @LAGalaxy! (3-0). Baggio Husidic with a 19-yarder to the far corner. Wonderful team goal. Galaxy rolling. #CHVvLA #mls

timelineItems.name: Lets Go Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Keane to Donovan to Husidic.....GOAL. GOOOOLAAAAAAALLLLL 3-0 #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Kirsten Heimlich
timelineItems.text: There is the Chivas USA we all know. WOW do they even know how to defend? #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 56' Goal for #LAGalaxy by Husidic | Gol para #LAGalaxy de Husidic #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 57' Ishizaki comes out for Samuel. Donovan moves into midfield. #LAGalaxy up 3-0.

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the SuperClasico match between Chivas USA and the LA Galaxy. Will Cubo Torres keep his goal scoring streak alive? Is this the weekend Landon Donovan scores number 135? Find out Sunday at 3pm ET on UniMas.
timelineItems.title: Chivas USA vs. LA Galaxy April 6, 2014 Preview | The Scouting Report

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Ishizaki comes off for Samuel. This should push Landon into the midfield and squash the diamond, no? #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: Husidic grabs the third. LA Galaxy rampant. Chivas USA abject. #CHVvLA #mls

timelineItems.name: FreakAboutSoccer
timelineItems.text: Not a big #MLS fan but glad #LAGalaxy is winning against #ChivasUSA � #Soccer #Football #Win #Fifa #followforfollow

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Quick passing between Keane and Donovan frees up Baggio Husidic for @LAGalaxy's third of the afternoon. http://t.co/KKcHmMTalE #CHVvLA...

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The #LAGalaxy are overwhelming the midfield right now. But Chivas can counter. They are very good at that.

timelineItems.comment: Juninho (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Andrew Quasared S.
timelineItems.text: And Ishizaki goes off to applause. Today was a real introduction for him. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Landon Donovan.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Now it’s about putting together a complete 90 minutes. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Andrew Quasared S.
timelineItems.text: So far I'd consider today a mediocre game for Keane. But yes, he even scores on his off-days. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: WeFollowFutbol
timelineItems.text: No goals for @landondonovan, but he does have two assists today. That's 119 on the career (No. 2 all-time). #mls #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy looking for more possession, but I don’t think they’ve given up on scoring goals yet. I’d be surprised to see LD get one, though.

timelineItems.name: e-MLS
timelineItems.text: Headlines will state @LAGalaxy have been rampant. In all honesty @cdchivasusa have been woeful and are victims of own downfall #CHVvLA #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Carlos Alvarez (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy).
Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Leonardo (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Kennedy denies Donovan his 135th

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA).
Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Andrew Jean-Baptiste.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 65' Chivas USA has ZERO shots on goal. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Robbie Keane.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Dan Kennedy.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: SAVE KENNEDY! Donovan sees 135 denied by the Chivas USA goalkeeper. So close to history.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Omar González (LA Galaxy) header from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Landon Donovan with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: WeFollowFutbol
timelineItems.text: 65' Almost history! @landondonovan tries to go hard near post but @1DanKennedy is able to parry it aside. #CHVvLA #mls

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: I take it back. Landon wants a goal. He might find it. He’s sprinting like a 16 year old LD out there. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Decker
timelineItems.text: You know you're married to a nurse when your wife asks "they're playing the Centers for Disease Control?" #LAGalaxy http://t.co/imvLswhf7E

timelineItems.name: Decker
timelineItems.text: You know you're married to a nurse when your wife asks "they're playing the Centers for Disease Control?" #LAGalaxy http://t.co/imvLswhf7E

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Leonardo (LA Galaxy).
Kristopher Tyrpak (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@1DanKennedy's big paw denies Donovan his date with history. Still 3-0 @LAGalaxy over @CDChivasUSA (67'). #CHVvLA #SuperClasico

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Lucas Lara
timelineItems.text: Chivas fans still cheering even though 3 goals down..... respect to that! #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Omar González.
Offside, LA Galaxy. Omar González tries a through ball, but Landon Donovan is caught offside.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Andrew Jean-Baptiste.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: 4 #LAGalaxy players are within 10 yards of the midfield line. This gives Chivas room to move behind them.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, LA Galaxy. Robbie Keane tries a through ball, but Landon Donovan is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: WATCH: The most beautiful team goal you’ll see all day: http://t.co/miOPy44klK http://t.co/Im9L5WsrqS

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: WATCH: The most beautiful team goal you’ll see all day: http://t.co/miOPy44klK http://t.co/Im9L5WsrqS

timelineItems.name: Andrew
timelineItems.text: I know #CHVvLA is supposed to be a rivalry, but it's hard to think of Chivas as the hated enemy when you mostly just feel sorry for them.

timelineItems.name: Snow Bruin
timelineItems.text: That was the worst offsides call I have ever seen. Landon was onside by at least a full yard. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Offside, LA Galaxy. Omar González tries a through ball, but Marcelo Sarvas is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: Apparently Chivas watched #PORvSEA yesterday and decided that’s the way to run a defense. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Eriq Zavaleta (Chivas USA).
Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Delay in match Todd Dunivant (LA Galaxy) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: The @LAGalaxy seem content to just pass the ball around in the back and keep the result.

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Todd Dunivant down on the ground for the @LAGalaxy. They can’t afford anymore injuries to the defense. #LAgalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Congratulations to South Central's own @oscaritosorto13 for making his @MLS for the @LAGalaxy.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Oscar Sorto enters the game for Todd Dunivant. Gargan switches to the left side. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Omar Gonzalez (LA Galaxy) header from the center of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Omar Gonzalez directs his header straight at Kennedy

timelineItems.name: Leftie Quixote
timelineItems.text: Dunivant hurting now. We're already weak in the fullback position, this is not good news for us. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Samuel Rosa (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Andrew Jean-Baptiste (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: Donovan almost makes a great long ball counterattacking pass towards his own end. #DoesThatCountAsTaunting? #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Samuel splits two defenders and gets fouled. Free kick #LAGalaxy from 25 yards out on the extreme right hand side.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Omar González (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Landon Donovan with a cross.
Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Carlos Bocanegra (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Loudest cheers of the afternoon from the @cdchivasusa crowd as Bofo enters the match. #Brony

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Bautista enters the game for #ChivasUSA, ending Erick Torres' goal-scoring streak at 4 games

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: The chipped shot from Sarvas is agonizingly close

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Leonardo (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Stefan Ishizaki with a cross.
Hand ball by Thomas McNamara (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Dan Gargan showing some speed down the right side. With the midfielders tucked in Gargan has space on the outside. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Offside, LA Galaxy. Omar González tries a through ball, but Robbie Keane is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 79' Sub for #ChivasUSA | Cambio: @BOFO_7_ in for @erickestefano15 http://t.co/3tBwA3UqnY

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 79' Sub for #ChivasUSA | Cambio: @BOFO_7_ in for @erickestefano15 http://t.co/3tBwA3UqnY

timelineItems.name: Nicholas Rosano
timelineItems.text: Bofo will always be loved in this country after that miss in the 2007 Gold Cup final. #CHVvLA #BofoTime

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Final 10 minutes of this game. #LAGalaxy have a 3 goal advantage. Defense needs the clean sheet. Chivas with 0 shots on goal.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Carlos Alvarez (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Mauro Rosales with a cross.
Foul by Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA).
Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Carlos Alvarez gets first shot on goal for #ChivasUSA. 81st minute. Brian Perk easy save for #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Carlos Alvarez with the first #chivasusa shot on goal in the 81st. In #superclasico Alvarez scored a short handed goal to preserve a draw

timelineItems.comment: Brian Perk (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Adolfo Bautista (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: That was a Blas Perez-style challenge from Bofo. Not quite dirty, but still pretty dirty.

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 82' Two clear scoring opportunities for #ChivasUSA in less than a minute... Goats unable to finish plays

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Can we just call the game? Too many people are getting smacked around. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Robbie Keane.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Dan Kennedy saves a Sarvas shot by using his, well, his - it was yeah… there. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The @LAGalaxy defense is getting killed. Tommy Meyer in for Gargan. They can’t take much more of this. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Arena makes his final sub: Tommy Meyer replaces Dan Gargan. Just 5 minutes left in this ballgame. Still 3-0. #CHVvL A

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Carlos Alvarez (Chivas USA).
Samuel Rosa (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The Back line for the #LAGalaxy: Sorto, Gonzalez, Leo, Meyer right now.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, LA Galaxy. Landon Donovan tries a through ball, but Omar González is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Dunivant exited the match with an ab ailment. Gargan went down on his right shoulder. Worrisome for LA.

timelineItems.name: Kristian Russell
timelineItems.text: We should re-name the #LAGalaxy defense the Starks. Cause they are being picked off one by one...

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Dan Kennedy denies Husidic a second

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Robbie Keane.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Just wide Sarvas! Keane plays Marcelo through on goal with a beautiful chip but the Brazilian couldn’t put it on frame. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: Having a 3 PM ET date with MLS every Sunday is nice. @UniMas #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA WUFC
timelineItems.text: 79' really? RT "@cdchivasusa: 79' Sub for #ChivasUSA | Cambio: @BOFO_7_ in for @erickestefano15 http://t.co/zwxJd6MlFa"

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA WUFC
timelineItems.text: 79' really? RT "@cdchivasusa: 79' Sub for #ChivasUSA | Cambio: @BOFO_7_ in for @erickestefano15 http://t.co/zwxJd6MlFa"

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Robbie Keane.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: 2 minutes of stoppage time and LD Draws a foul at the top of the box. Will LD Take it for the record? #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Juninho.
Foul by Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA).
Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Ian Sarachan
timelineItems.text: See @cdchivasusa, the more things change, the more they stay the same. #Superclasico #LAGalaxy @LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Chivas USA 0, LA Galaxy 3.
